name: mm::page_table::cursor::Cursor::<'rcu, C>::move_forward

mm::page_table::cursor::Cursor::<'rcu, C.doc: Gets the virtual address range that the current entry covers.

mm::page_table::pte_index.doc: The index of a VA's PTE in a page table node at the given level.

doc:
Traverses forward to the end of [`Self::cur_va_range`].

 If reached the end of the current page table node, it (recursively)
 moves itself up to the next page of the parent page.
